longBusinessSummary: NOK Corporation manufactures, imports, and sells seal products, industrial mechanical parts, hydraulic and pneumatic equipment, nuclear power equipment, synthetic chemical products, and electronic and various other products in Japan and internationally. It operates through Seal Business, Electronic Product Business, Roll Business, and Other Businesses segments. The company's seal products include oil seals, packings, O-rings, mechanical seals, lip and segment seals, metal gaskets, static metal packings, and magnetic fluid seals; and electronic products comprise flexible circuits and boards. It also provides rubber vibration and sound isolating products for high-precision information equipment for automobiles; and synthetic rubber materials, industrial and iron rubber products, iron-rubber belts, iron-rubber products for traffic safety, engineering plastic products, and phenolic resin molding materials. In addition, the company offers metallic bellows to seal materials; diaphragm couplings for use in aircraft gas turbines, and rotating equipment for industrial turbines and compressors; pressure accumulators; and industrial functional components, including actuators, compressor valves, housing and related equipment, recoil starters, solenoids valves, and various other valves. Further, it provides lubricants for automobiles, industrial machinery, and electrical home appliances; Gleitpan coating materials; development and charge, pressure and heat, and paper pick up rollers; cleaning blades; components for ATMs and other terminals; rollers and belts used in textile production machinery; and environment-related products, including water filter and industrial membrane modules, and braid-reinforced PVDF membrane and humidifying membrane modules, as well as engages in the installation work and other activities. NOK Corporation was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
